title: From Super Bowl hero to Super Bowl mystery: Malcolm Butler still doesn't know why Bill Belichick benched him

sources.name: CBS Sports NFL
sources.title: From Super Bowl hero to Super Bowl mystery: Malcolm Butler still doesn't know why Bill Belichick benched him
sources.description: From the glory of Super Bowl XLIX to a baffling sideline in Super Bowl LII, Butler's benching remains one of the NFL's most controversial coaching decisions -- and he still doesn't know the full reason.
